item.title: About mini-me
item.description: I’d like to think of this micro.blog as a personal space for posting quick (and weird) ideas âœ¨, unprocessed photos ðŸ“¸, and probably short book reviews ðŸ“š. In a way I like those social-network-style entries, and I want to be able to continue post them even if I decided to go social-media free. That’s the biggest motivation for creating this website. Like a mini version of my site, of myself. And this is why this site has the subdomain mini.
